title: Straight Time Hourly Earnings, First Class Railroads for United States
notes:
Data Through May 1923 Include S. And T. Companies And Were Computed By NBER. Data Beginning June 1923 Excludes Switching And Terminal Companies. Source: Interstate Commerce Commission, Wage Statistics.

This NBER data series m08178 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08178
